item.title: 7 killed in pool hall shooting weeks after massacre at different pool hall
item.description: A similar pool hall massacre took place last month in the southwestern tourist city of General Villamil Playas, leaving at least nine dead.

item.title: Hurricane Erin likely to bring East Coast "life-threatening" surf, rip currents
item.description: Erin is the first hurricane to develop over the Atlantic this year, and meteorologists are closely tracking its path and forecast.
